images.powers: Master of the Mystic Arts and sorcery
images.occupation: The Sorcerer Supreme: protects the earth from magical and mystical threats.

images.powers: Virtually immortal and has immense control of cosmic energy
images.occupation: He mainly consumes planets to sustain his own life force.

images.powers: Incredible superhuman strength, Regenerative healing, Durability, and size manipulation.
images.occupation: Superhero and a member of the Avengers, but his alter ego, Bruce Banner, is a physicist and a scientist.

images.powers: His suit gives him a variety of abilities such as flight, a computer interface, and superhuman strength.
He is extremely intelligent, has high tech information, can time travel, and can make force fields and can manipulate energy.
images.occupation: He is a time traveling conquerer who seeks to control all of time and space.
